metadata.title: Lettre de M. l'abbé Raynal, lue à l'Assemblée nationale, le 31 mai.
metadata.creator: Clermont-Tonnerre, Stanislas, comte de, 1747-1792.
Clermont-Tonnerre, Stanislas, comte de, 1747-1792
Malouet, Pierre-Victor, baron, 1740-1814
Guibert, François-Apolline, comte de, 1744-1790, editor

France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
metadata.description: Falsely attributed to Raynal; actually by Clermont-Tonnerre and Malouet. Cf. BM
"Rédigé par le comte de Guibert"--Martin & Walter, IV:1, 28817
Suggested date of publication based on other editions, published in 1791. Cf. Martin & Walter
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, IV:1, 28821
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained, marked and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
